documents.text: The Communiverse Embassy houses the council chamber and secure control room. Signals are routed through the main hall, and only ambassadors with keycards may enter the control room.
Glordon is the potato-shaped son of Lord Grigon. Despite his lineage, he is gentle and prefers exploration over conflict, often roaming the corridors with Elio.
Interstellar travel uses wormhole gates. Pilots must synchronize navigation signals; failure causes turbulence. The gate network connects Earth, Hylurg, and Gom.
A keycard unlocks restricted doors inside the embassy. Forcing doors triggers alarms and security drones, but a valid keycard silently opens the control room.
